history.narrative: Law 1-26 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-52, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary and the Committee on Criminal Law. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 1, 1975, and July 15, 1975, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 4, 1975, it was assigned Act No. 1-38 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
